item.title: Community
item.description:
SHA/OS is an operating system full of distributed high-availability tools that runs on a wide variety of devices and platforms.

SHA/OS run hosted as a user application on top of an existing linux system or as a native stand alone Debian stable custom release.

item.title: Variations in the control process
item.description:
The control process of an organization can be implemented in a number of ways.

One variation is in the manner in which the elements in the control process are allocated to different organizational members.

A common situation exists when a supervisor gives a worker instructions that tell him what is …

item.title: Control Processes and Systems
item.description:
Control is a word that has a number of meanings.

We are concerned with control in relation to matching performance with necessary or required conditions to obtain a purpose or objective.

The essence here is on reactivity and integration of effort, required accomplishment of an end.

There are a number …

item.title: Self-regulating systems
item.description:
Tends towards equilibrium, we noted that parts interconnected to accomplish a purpose are identified as a system. This is a property of the system, however, there are many others occurring naturally, which have this same property called homeostasis.

In an organization, modern production-control techniques not only plan production schedules but …
